msbt.message: Oh! I just remembered I saw Gulliver today! He washed up here again. I wonder what keeps bringing him back to our shore?
Have you heard the rumor that K.K. is making an appearance here later?They say he's even going to take our song requests, !I want to have a good one ready, but I'm too excited to think clearly
I heard that Label is here on the island for the day, .I'm trying to work up the nerve to ask her opinion of my outfit
Did you know that Saharah is visiting right now?If you're in the market for a new rug or something else Saharah carries, she has good deals, .
Can you believe THE K.K. is HERE, performing live in front of our own Resident Services, RIGHT NOW? I heard that he might even take song requests! Imagine if he sung something that I requested
Sundays mean a visit from Daisy Mae, and her visit means I can buy fresh turnips!
Have you noticed that suspicious boat anchored off the northern shore of the island, ? I never thought a boat could look untrustworthyuntil now.
You want to hear something weird? When I was out for a walk earlier, I felt some kind of EERIE presence
, shouldn't you be at your concert now?That's so amazing that K.K. himself would put on a show just for you!What an amazing present! , I'm so envious!

Did you hear K.K. is visiting ?He came all this way to put on a birthday show for a special someone here on our island! I wonder if he'd be willing to do a show for the rest of us, once the birthday concert is over
Today Mabel will be on the island! I really look forward to her visits. She's so much fun to talk to.She'll show me some clothes, we'll chat, and maybe I'll even find something to buy from her.
I heard that C.J. is here on the island.He's so great! I just wish I was any good at fishing, so I could bring him lots and lots of fish!
So, Flick is here today. Have you run into him yet?I thought he'd be sullen at first, but he's actually easy to talk to.
Did you know Kicks is here on the island, ?As much as I love trendy footwear, I'd be happy to just find a new pair that's comfortable and practical.
Oh! I need to try and catch up with Celeste while she's still around.I wanted to ask about a constellation I thought I might use in a poem
I was taking a walk earlier and managed to catch something out of the corner of my eye. It was yellow, and it was bouncing around with sooo much energy!I'm telling you, it was the oddest thing, .

Oh, that reminds me! Leif is in town today, .There's a certain type of flower I've been wanting to add to my garden, but it's a bit persnickety. I'm hoping he can give me a little green-thumb guidance.

! My goodness, I'm so glad I ran into you!Somebody's sleeping on the beach, and it looks like he's in pretty rough shape. There was something strangely familiar about the whole ordealHuh. Anyway, I went looking for you right away, .Although in retrospect, I probably should have just offered to help them right then and there.
A little while ago, I ran into someone visiting from off-island., have you seen them too?
